description:
This Weapon Pack is included in the Starlink: Battle for Atlas™ Collection 1 Pack. Check it out for the best way to complete your fleet!*

Hailstorm allows its wielder to fire short, accurate bursts of frost at their enemies. 

Meteor Mk. 2 projects an intense field of heat around its user, allowing you to ram into enemy ships for maximum destruction.

*Starlink: Battle For Atlas game required to play. 

Starlink: Battle for Atlas™ Digital Hailstorm Weapon Pack* includes: 
-One digital Hailstorm Weapon
-One digital Meteor Mk. 2 Weapon Harness the powers of frost and fire to gain the advantage in battle. 

*This pack is included in the Deluxe Edition of Starlink: Battle for Atlas.
name: Starlink: Battle for Atlas™ Digital Hailstorm Weapon Pack
